resources.string: This is the sample for using MAHAndroidUpdater lib. MAHAndroidUpdater is library for updating android apps installed to android device. \nBy it\'s help old application gets update from Google Play Market. If your app for some reason suddlenly has deleted from PLayStore you can provide you new app to old users too.
Open dialog to see localized dialog

* We need help to add new language localization support for libarary. If you have any hope to help us we were very happy and you can check following GitHub Issues URL contribute. If you have any question please ask to me on settarxan@gmail.com
